name: Trouble Magia: Wakeari Shoujo wa Mirai wo Kachitoru Tame ni Ikoku no Mahou Gakkou e Ryuugaku Shimasu
storyline:
The main character had a certain purpose when she decided to study abroad at a famous and traditional magic school.

That is—

To break the curse that abruptly turns you into an animal!

The main character becomes involved with the student council members of the magic school but will she be able to break the curse safely despite always finding herself getting into trouble?—
summary:
Girl meets boy in this adolescent tale of magic. Your year to seize the future is about to begin!

In search of clues to break the curse that causes her to abruptly transform into an animal, the protagonist decides to study abroad at the Reveal Academy of Magic. Will she be able to break the curse while dealing with all sorts of trouble?
